_header: The star [stern] of heaven mother Mary
Subjects: Virgin Mary, hymns to; hymns, to Virgin Mary

VandAReid7.Transcription:
The stern of heuen modre MaryeThat with hir mylke fed cryst
                    ihesuOf deth that Adam folilyHad plantid she the roote vp
                    dreuThat same stern wochsaue she nowThe sterns aboue to stil and
                    peesWhoso stryfe and batailles as is to trowArn cause of folkes dedely
                    disseesPater noster Aue maria
VandAReid7.Note: On the verso of the second original flyleaf from the front.
